titles.title: Come, Let's Celebrate, For The Lord Is Great

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come, let's celebrate, for the Lord is great.
Great and greatly to be praised, lift up heart and voice,
Sing to the Lord, Rejoice in the Lord always.
Rejoice in the Lord again I say rejoice.
Rejoice in the Lord always.
Rejoice in the Lord always.
